Adam Jack wrote:
> I
> was trying to says "if suites are the internal representation
> of testcase collections, with hierarchy, then help the user mange
> them". 

I don't think anyone on the list would disagree. What most of us seem to
disagree with is that the way *you* want your collections to be managed
is fundamental enough to be put into the framework. Doing it as an addon
would be easy enough, and absolutely tolerable.

Regards, Ilja
